text: Kenneth Alan Seddington (26 October 1946 – 9 January 2021), better known as Ken Sedd, was an English character actor. He was best known for his comedic roles in the sketches on The Benny Hill Show from 1969 to 1984.Who's Who of The Benny Hill Show Sedd was also a professional stuntman for Benny Hill. Sedd died in Camberley, Surrey on 9 January 2021 at the age of 76.Kenneth Alan Seddington 1946–2021 ==References== ==Other websites== * *Aveleyman: Ken Sedd Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English television actors Category:English comedians Category:Actors from Middlesex Category:Stunt performers
title: Ken Sedd
